resources.string: This activity will show all the folders available in the phone which contains music files in it, users can select any of the folder and check the songs in the folder.

This activity will show the songs available in the folder that was selected in the main activity, users can play any songs listed here and play, pause, play next song or previous song using the music controls in the bottom of the screen, clicking on the album art in the bottom will take you to the now playing screen.
This activity will show the current playing song, users can play, pause, play next song or previous song using the music controls in the bottom of the screen.

string-array.name: musiclist
string-array.item: "One Dance - Drake Ft Wizkid Drake Ft Wizkid And Kyla"
"I Took A Pill In Ibiza - Mike Posner"
"This Is What You Came For - Calvin Harris Ft Rihanna"
"Work From Home - Fifth Harmony Ft Ty Dolla Sign"
